title: Front open space- A minimum open space 12 m wide from edge of the road or 37 m from the centre of National Highway/State Highway/Major District road, whichever is more is required
clause_text: Front open space- A minimum open space 12 m wide from edge of the road or 37 m from the centre of National Highway/State Highway/Major District road, whichever is more is required..
